module.name: Directory
module.changelog: *13.0.8* FREEPBX-9951 Japanese language prompts *13.0.7* FREEPBX-10119 Fix recording prompts. *13.0.6* FREEPBX-10118 Spelling *13.0.5* FREEPBX-10121 Fix custom entries *13.0.4* FREEPBX-9821 Fix validations on adding custom entries, also spruce up visuals *13.0.3* FREEPBX-9609 Option to Limit IVR Direct Dialing to a Directory *13.0.2* Version bump Beta *13.0.1alpha3* Add Spanish prompts *13.0.1alpha2* Fix popover resolves FREEPBX-8993 for directory *12.0.0* Remove Toggle Val, use HTML5 placeholder instead *2.11.0.5* Include license file *2.11.0.4* FREEPBX-7244 The Asterisk Manager connnection needs to be made regardless. *2.11.0.3* #6354 *2.11.0.2* #6354, #6840 *2.11.0.1* #6882, #6913 *2.11.0.0* #6051 *2.10.0.10* re #5784 - *2.10.0.9* assotred bug fixes *2.10.0.8* #5551 *2.10.0.7* smoother experience when using flite *2.10.0.6* re #1076, #1067 - clarify help text, fix directory hook for ivr *2.10.0.5* Security update; downstream changes *2.10.0.4* Security update; downstream changes *2.10.0.3* Security update; downstream changes *2.10.0.2* #5463 *2.10.0.1* #5389 *2.10.0.0* new version changes
